Ward {3}
[i]The Last Princess [/i]– When Nyna, Saint of Salvation enters, if you don't control another Noble, scry 4. If you do control another Noble, she enters with an additional shield counter on her.
[i]Hope of Archanea[/i] – When Nyna leaves the battlefield, other permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
[i]The Fire Emblem [/i]– As long as you control five or more other Nobles, creatures you control get +3/+3.
